params.amounts: Amount of DPX to deposit into each strike index
params.strikeIndices: Indices of strikes to deposit into

params.timestamp: Timestamp from which the monthly expiry is to be calculated

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.strikes: Strikes to set for next epoch

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

isEpochExpired.details: epoch => whether the epoch is expired

isVaultReady.details: epoch => whether the vault is ready (boostrapped)

bootstrap().notice: Bootstraps a new epoch and mints option tokens equivalent to user deposits for the epoch

deposit(uint256,uint256).notice: Deposits dpx into vaults to mint options in the next epoch for selected strikes

exercise(uint256,uint256,uint256,address.notice: Exercise calculates the PnL for the user. Withdraw the PnL in DPX from the SSF and transfer it to the user. Will also the burn the doTokens from the user.

expireEpoch().notice: Sets the current epoch as expired.

getEpochTimes(uint256).notice: Returns start and end times for an epoch

getMonthlyExpiryFromTimestamp(uint256).notice: Calculates the monthly expiry from a solidity date

isVaultReady(uint256).notice: Is vault ready for next epoch

purchase(uint256,uint256).notice: Purchases calls for the current epoch

withdrawForStrike(uint256,uint256).notice: Withdraws balances for a strike in a completed epoch
